sourcing.instructions: - Manganese Oxide: Chemical supply stores or online chemical suppliers.
steps: - Manganese Oxide: Chemical supply stores or online chemical suppliers.
1. In a clean, dry mixing bowl, combine 80 g of Manganese Oxide and 150 g of Sodium Carbonate.
preparation.raw_text: 1. In a clean, dry mixing bowl, combine 80 g of Manganese Oxide and 150 g of Sodium Carbonate.

steps: 1. After 4 hours, turn off the oven and allow the mold to cool to room temperature (~25°C or 77°F) inside the oven.
cooling.raw_text: 1. After 4 hours, turn off the oven and allow the mold to cool to room temperature (~25°C or 77°F) inside the oven.

steps: 1. If needed, use fine-grit sandpaper to smooth any rough edges on the solid sample.
post_processing.raw_text: 1. If needed, use fine-grit sandpaper to smooth any rough edges on the solid sample.
